long_description: Ride comfortably and efficiently on the Marin San Rafael DS3 hybrid bike, which offers an upright riding position and a suspension fork to smooth out bumps and rough roads. Lightweight 6061 aluminum frame is built to increase strength while offering weight savings; shaped seatstays and chainstays improve ride quality. Suntour suspension fork helps smooth out rough roads with 63mm of travel; also features lockout adjustment when suspension isn't needed or for more efficient hill climbing. Triple crankset and wide-ranging 11-32 cassette provide 24 gears for fun, swift cruising and easier spinning up hills. Shimano trigger shifters and derailleurs provide responsive, smooth shifting through all 24 gear combinations. Puncture-resistant Schwalbe Smart Sam tires offer an efficient ride that rolls up to speed quickly. No special shoes required-platform pedals accommodate a variety of casual shoes. Marin San Rafael DS3 specs are subject to change.
short_description: Ride comfortably and efficiently on the Marin San Rafael DS3 hybrid bike, which offers an upright riding position and a suspension fork to smooth out bumps and rough roads.
